moves.name: Power Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.
